original_text: When I looked, I saw that you had made an image of a calf as your idol. You really had done a very bad thing. You had quickly stopped doing the things that the Lord your God had commanded you to do.
korean_text: 내가 본즉 너희가 너희의 하나님 여호와께 범죄하여 자기를 위하여 송아지를 부어 만들어서 여호와께서 명령하신 도를 빨리 떠났기로

sentences.original_text: I saw that you had made an image of a calf
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 보니 너희가 송아지 형상을 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: You really had done a very bad thing
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 정말 아주 나쁜 일을 했더라

sentences.original_text: You had quickly stopped doing the things
that the Lord your God had commanded you to do
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님 여호와가 너에게 명하신 것들을
